name: Clodo
long_description:
Clodo is the AI Assistant for Real Estate Agents. 

Clodo helps agents remember and follow up with all their leads. Building up your database and following up with leads are the two most valuable actions you can perform as a real estate agent. Currently, both of these tasks involve spending hours sifting through dashboards and spreadsheets, and a lot of guesswork.

With Clodo, we see agents effortlessly performing both those tasks and turning their database into a stronger engine for business.
one_liner: The AI Assistant for Real Estate Agents
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
